place.name: ABERAMAN
place.gazetteerText: ABERAMAN, a village at the influx of the Aman to the Cynon, 2 miles SE of Aberdare, Glamorgan. It has a post office† under Aberdare. The ironworks and the mansion ofBailey, Esq., are adjacent. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
